Data: In 1979 WC, the first three matches, the teams which won the toss inserted the opposition in to bat. Just like this WC.
Hoffmann to Hayden, 2 runs Fullish, on the middle and leg stump line, deflected to the on side for a single
Hoffmann to Hayden, no run just short of driveable length, on the off and middle, Hayden thrusts forward and smothers the delivery.
Hoffmann to Hayden, 1 run Hayden leans forward, the ball is slightly shorter than he anticipates and he adjusts by opening the bat-face and runs it down to thirdman
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run On the good length, around off and middle, Gilchrist stays back, turns it towards cover point.
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run slightly overpitched, driven to mid-off
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, 1 run on the leg and middle, Gilchrist works it past square-leg for a single.
Wright to Gilchrist, 2 runs on the hips, Gilchrist pivots to flick it to fineleg region and will come back for two.
Wright to Gilchrist, no run full, straight, on the leg and middle, Gilchrist gives his wrists some rest, just turns it to midwicket
Wright to Gilchrist, FOUR runs Mis-field! Poonia is the culprit. Gilchrist times his offdrive well and Poonia, at long off, doesn't time his sliding dive well.
Wright to Gilchrist, 1 run
Wright to Hayden, no run honing in on the off stump, pushed to cover region
Wright to Hayden, no run short of length, gentle pace but Hayden is not going to be sucked into any over-ambitious swipe across the line. He just pushes it to cover point
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run on the middle and off stump, full in length (they have been pretty good with the length so far), worked to the on side
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, 1 run Again full in length, sliding away and Gilchrist late cuts it to thirdman. Ala Arjuna Ranatunga
Hoffmann to Hayden, 1 run Full and on the middle stump line, driven past the bowler but the mid-on comes across to cut it off
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run slightly overpitched, on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run lands on a length, on the middle, goes on straight, Gilchrist thrusts his right foot across and defends

Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run Almost squeezed between bat and pad. Fullish, on the middle stump line, again Gilchrist's right foot is planted across and he tries to drive it around his pad. It doesn't work and he gets a inside edge and the ball rolls down t
Wright to Hayden, no run Full and straight, no deviation whatsover, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
Wright to Hayden, no run angled away, turned straight to point
Wright to Hayden, 1 run back of length, on the off stump, Hayden punches it to right of mid-off for a single.
Wright to Gilchrist, no run sliding down to the pads, Gilchrist tries to tickle it away, fails and it runs off the pads to short fine leg
Wright to Gilchrist, 1 run Full, inviting a drive, Gilchrist obliges with a inside-out effort and the cover fielder makes a half-stop
Wright to Hayden, 1 run tip and run. Length delivery on the off and middle, Hayden taps it towards mid-off, one look at Gilchrist who responds favourably and off they go
Hoffmann to Hayden, no run Guess where this was bowled? Yep, full, straight and on that off and middle stump line, turned to point.
Hoffmann to Hayden, FOUR runs Thwack! Hayden had enough of pottering around. Thrust his front foot out and swung through the line.
Hoffmann to Hayden, no run No change from the bowler, again that sliding/angling/ delivery on the off stump line, driven to cover

Hoffmann to Hayden, no run Good job from Smith the wicketkeeper. Hayden went for a drive on the up and was beaten. The ball bounced shoulder high (Smith is standing up to the stumps) and Smith gathered it smartly and whipped off the bails but Hayden had dra
Hoffmann to Hayden, 1 run works this fullish delivery to cover region for a single
Hoffmann to Gilchrist, no run ambling across towards off stump, Gilchrist intercepts with a open-face of the bat and runs it to point
Wright to Hayden, no run back of length, on the off stump, punched to mid-off.
Wright to Hayden, 1 run Short, on the middle, swatted away past square leg.
Wright to Gilchrist, 1 run fuller, on the middle and leg, flicked past square leg.
Wright to Hayden, no run slightly short, slightly outside off and Hayden goes for a cut. Not great timing though and the ball heads straight to point
Wright to Hayden, 1 run touch short in length, on the middle stump line, worked past square-leg for a single.
Wright to Gilchrist, 1 run a gentle seam-up delivery, on the off stump line, driven to right of mid-off
Brown to Gilchrist, no run starts off with a full-length delivery, on the off stump line, pushed to point
Brown to Gilchrist, no run
Brown to Gilchrist, FOUR runs Swished away! Overpitcched outside off, and Gilchrist crashes it past mid-off. Easy pickings.
Brown to Gilchrist, no run corrects his line, gets it on the middle stump line, defended away
Brown to Gilchrist, no run 73.8 mph delivery on the off stump line, turned to point

Brown to Gilchrist, OUT Dougie nails Gilchrist. Scotland fielders mob the bowler. Plumb in front. Full and straight on the middle stump line, Gilchrist tries to swing it across the line on a bent knee. No wood on leather and the ball thuds into the pad. Dea
Wright to Hayden, 1 run Hayden gets Ponting on strike with a tickle to the midwicket.
Wright to Ponting, no run short of length, on the off and middle, defended off the back foot
Wright to Ponting, no run pushed to cover.
Wright to Ponting, no run on the middle stump line, Ponting lunges forward, as he does, and pushes it to the on side
Wright to Ponting, no run another lunge, another dot ball. Ponting has the tendency to plant his left foot across and sometimes it gets him into trouble.
Wright to Ponting, no run slightly short and he cuts it to point
Brown to Hayden, 1 run Full, just outside off, Hayden runs it down to thirdman
Brown to Ponting, FOUR runs He is past that 1000-run landmark in WC. Reached there with a dash of class. He leant forward and on drove a full-length delivery past mid-on
Brown to Ponting, no run beaten! Shapes to cut but not short enough and the ball bounces over the flashing blade
Brown to Ponting, no run Should have beat Mark Waugh's record there. Overpitched, well outside off and Ponting drives hard but straight to cover
Brown to Ponting, no run slides in on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket.
Brown to Ponting, no run full and outside off, Ponting leans forward and square-drives to point. Bit of fumble but no damage done.
Wright to Hayden, FOUR runs Slap! Bit of room outside off and Hayden leans back to cut it past point.
Wright to Hayden, no run slightly slower, outside off, Hayden goes down on a bent knee, runs it to backward point
Wright to Hayden, no run close to the off stump this time and Hayden wants to cut it but is cramped for room. The ball bounds away of an edge to point
Wright to Hayden, no run on the middle stump line, punched to mid-on

Wright to Hayden, no run fuller, on the middle stump line, Hayden decides to play it inside-out towards cover. Oohs and aahs from the 'keeper as Hayden played it a touch late. Smith thought it would rap him on the pad.
Wright to Hayden, 1 run sliding down on the pads, turned to short fine leg
Brown to Hayden, 1 run on the leg and middle, worked past square-leg for a single.
Brown to Ponting, FOUR runs Imperious! Ponting becomes Australia' top-scorer in WC with a fierce pull shot.
Brown to Ponting, 1 run
Brown to Hayden, 1 run Fifty up for Hayden. Ripple of applause goes around. The ball drifted on to the pads and Hayden sent it down to fine leg
Brown to Ponting, FOUR runs Class. Sheer Class. Slightly overpitched outside off and Ponting eases on the front foot and drives it with the full face of the blade, past mid-off.
Brown to Ponting, no run again he leans forward, but no full-pitched stuff this time, he turns it to point
Rogers to Hayden, no run floats it on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side
Rogers to Hayden, no run
Rogers to Hayden, no run on the off stump line, turns in slightly, pushed to cover and Ponting sets off, Hayden is not interested and Ponting gets back to the crease in a hurry
Rogers to Hayden, 1 run
Rogers to Ponting, no run pushes that one through, on the middle and off, Ponting leans forward to defend
Rogers to Ponting, no run another one that comes in with the arm, on the middle and off, pushed to the off side
Brown to Hayden, 1 run slightly short of length, angling away, pushed to mid-off and they rush across for a single
Brown to Ponting, no run full in length, on the middle and leg stump line, worked to midwicket
Brown to Ponting, no run gente seam-up stuff on the off stump line, Ponting gets behind the line, turns it to the leg side and the 'keeper Smith goes across to pick it up

Brown to Ponting, FOUR runs Chipped over mid-on! Slower delivery outside off and Ponting tries to swing it over mid-on, the bat-handle rotates in his hands and the timing goes awry, but he still gets enough wood behind it to send it up and over mid-on
Brown to Ponting, 1 run on the middle and leg, short of length, paddled away for a single
Brown to Hayden, no run
Rogers to Ponting, no run Round the wicket from the spinner. Ponting looks to sweep but gets strck on the pads. Half an appeal for lbw. Good ball that time
Rogers to Ponting, FOUR runs Quicker ball slipped in outside off. Ponting angles the bat and glides to third man for a fine four
Rogers to Ponting, no run
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run Driven to mid-off for an easy single
Rogers to Hayden, no run Quicker and straighter ball. Hayden down the track and cracks it straight into the ground. Good pick up by the bowler on the follow through
Rogers to Hayden, no run Defended to the on side

Brown to Ponting, no run Dropped! Wide of off stump from Brown and Ponting goes for the drive to cover. Thin edge goes to the wicketkeeper but Colin Smith can't latch on. Tough chance that but it's not often that Ponting offers a second chance
Brown to Ponting, 1 run Clipped to the leg side for an easy single
Brown to Hayden, 1 wide Drifting down the leg side.
Brown to Hayden, no run Driven forcefully back to the bowler but no run there. Brown picks it up cleanly

Brown to Hayden, FOUR runs Short ball from Brown and Hayden punishes it savagely for a four through midwicket. Cracked off the front foot and the fielders have no chance. As they would say in these parts, 'Not a man move'
Brown to Hayden, 1 run
Brown to Ponting, 1 run Drifting down leg side and Ponting clips it for an easy single to square leg
Rogers to Ponting, no run Teasing delivery to Ponting. Left-arm spinner Rogers bowling from round the wicket, pitches on off and spins away. Ponting's outstretched bat can't make contact.
Rogers to Ponting, no run Straighter this time and full. Patted back to the bowler
Rogers to Ponting, no run Another good ball, turning away from Ponting and having him in a bit of trouble. Flighted outside off and Ponting can only manage a thickish edge to the covers
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run Short and Ponting rocks back and cuts it through extra cover for an easy single
Rogers to Hayden, 1 run Hayden down the track, nullifying the flight and spin. Easing it to midwicket for a single
Rogers to Ponting, no run Ponting uses his feet this time but Rogers does well to hold it back. Driven to covers
Haq to Hayden, 1 run Flight and drifting down leg. Hayden clips it away to the leg side for an easy single

Haq to Ponting, 1 run Over the wicket this time. Starts from outside off and turns in after pitching. Good grip from the surface here. Ponting gets on the back foot and cuts a short one away for a single
Haq to Hayden, 1 run Back to round the wicket. Hayden waits and turns it away
Haq to Ponting, 1 run Down the track and taken on the full. Driven to mid-on for a singe

Haq to Hayden, OUT Gotcha! Round the wicket again and the ball pitches on middle and turns away. Hayden tries to drive through the on side but can't account for the spin after the ball grips the surface. Loud appeal and 'slow death' Steve Bucknor raises the
Haq to Clarke, no run Down the track straight away. Ball is drifted outside off and Clarke gets it on the full and drives straight to cover
Rogers to Ponting, no run Rogers slow through the air. Bit of bounce after pitching. Ponting goes back and drives it uppishly to the point fielder
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run Bit of hesitation after Ponting drives to the off side but a mis-field allows the batsmen to complete a single
Rogers to Clarke, no run Clarke down the track and patted back to the bowler
Rogers to Clarke, no run Quicker through the air this time. Defended watchfully
Rogers to Clarke, no run Quicker again, defended off the back foot. Clarke appears in the mood here
Rogers to Clarke, FOUR runs Quicker on off this time. With twinkling feet, Clarke moves away and cuts wide of the gully fielder for a fine four
Haq to Ponting, no run
Haq to Ponting, SIX runs CRACK! Down the track and Ponting rips a flighted ball from Haq straight over his head for a big six. As easy as Andy there
Haq to Ponting, no run Defended to the leg side.
Haq to Ponting, no run Slower and pitching on off. Ponting pushes firmly down the ground
Haq to Ponting, FOUR runs Quicker ball again but too wayward down the leg side. Ponting sweeps it to where it belongs - to the fine leg fence
Haq to Ponting, 1 run Tapped for an easy single
Rogers to Ponting, no run lands on the offstump, turns away, Ponting leans forward, waits for the spin, pushes it to point
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run floated on the middle, driven to long on for a single
Rogers to Clarke, 1 run on the middle, Clarke goes back, wrists it away towards square-leg
Rogers to Ponting, SIX runs Whoa! Ponting waltzes down the track and sends the ball soaring over long-off. Super strike.
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run predictably a flatter delivery follows, slightly short as well, Ponting goes back, works it to square-leg
Rogers to Clarke, no run goes on straight with the arm, on the middle, Clarke leans forward, wants to work it past square-leg, doesn't get much power behind that and the ball rolls to the on side
Haq to Ponting, 1 run floated on the off stump line, Ponting comes down the track, drives to long on for yet another single
Haq to Clarke, 1 run floated well outside off, Clarke comes out, reaches for the delivery, drives it past cover
Haq to Ponting, 1 run Fifty up for Ponting. 59th ODI fifty. Came up with a drive to long-off
Haq to Clarke, 1 run slightly short, on the off stump line, Clarke backs away, cuts it past point
Haq to Ponting, no run leans forward, no room or pace to work with and he offers a defensive blade
Haq to Ponting, 1 run turns in from middle and off, Ponting turns it past square-leg
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run Ponting gets off the strike with a drive to long on
Rogers to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track, the ball dips in front of him, he adjusts, pushes it out through mid-on
Rogers to Ponting, 2 runs drifts on to the pads, Ponting turns it past square-leg and they run hard to come back for two.
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run low full-toss and Ponting drives it to long on
Rogers to Clarke, 1 run slightly slower, slightly short, just outside off and Clarke backs away to cut it past point
Rogers to Ponting, FOUR runs Nonchalant drive through covers. A low full-toss and Ponting just eases it through the offside ring for a boundary
Haq to Clarke, 1 run on the middle and leg, worked past midwicket
Haq to Ponting, 1 leg bye Comes down the track, tries to drive but gets it on the pads and they will cross over
Haq to Clarke, 1 run
Haq to Ponting, 1 run
Haq to Clarke, no run full and flat, on the off and middle, driven through the on side
Haq to Clarke, no run
Wright to Ponting, 1 run on the middle and leg, picked off the legs, past squareleg for a single
Wright to Clarke, 1 run Drifting on to the pads, tickled away fine
Wright to Ponting, 1 run slower ball, on the middle stump, driven to long on
Wright to Clarke, 1 run
Wright to Ponting, no run
Wright to Ponting, FOUR runs overpitched on the legs, Ponting flicks it behind square. Smooth.
Haq to Ponting, 2 runs tossed on the middle and leg, Ponting wrists it away past square-leg and will get two runs.
Haq to Ponting, SIX runs Bosh! And there he goes again. Another charge down the track. Blink. The ball flies over the long-on boundary.
Haq to Ponting, 1 run surprise surprise this is one lot flatter, on the middle stump line, nudged past square-leg
Haq to Hodge, FOUR runs turns in towards off stump, Hodge backs away to cut it past short thirdman
Haq to Hodge, 1 run low full toss, on the middle, driven to long-on
Haq to Ponting, 1 run lands on the off stump, turns in slightly, Ponting eases forward, punches it towards long-on.
Rogers to Ponting, no run drifts in on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run comes down the track, the ball is fired on the middle and leg, driven to long on
Rogers to Hodge, 1 run slightly slower, on the legs, worked past square-leg for a single
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run
Rogers to Hodge, 1 run Another quick single. A push to extra cover and off they went.
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run Singles keep coming. The milkmen are at work. On the legs, a tickle to fine-leg
Brown to Ponting, 1 run Just outside off, full in length, run down to thirdman
Brown to Hodge, 2 runs Super shot! Easy on the eye. Just short of driveable length, on the off stump line, Hodge leans forward, punches it through cover.
Brown to Hodge, 1 run on the off stump line, pushed out to left of cover for a single.
Brown to Ponting, 1 run on the middle, straight, Ponting brings up the 50 of the partnership with a drive to long on
Brown to Hodge, 1 run slower one, outside off, Hodge waits, opens the bat-face, runs it down to thirdman for yet another single.
Brown to Ponting, FOUR runs drilled! Overpitched on the off and middle stump line, driven down the ground.
Rogers to Hodge, 1 run angling in on the legs, driven down to long-on.
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run similar delivery, same result.
Rogers to Hodge, no run arm-ball, on the off and middle, pushed away defensively to the off side
Rogers to Hodge, no run slightly short, just outside off, Hodge cuts but straight to point.
Rogers to Hodge, no run bit of flight, bit of loop, on the off stump line, Hodge leans forward, drives back to the bowler
Rogers to Hodge, 1 run on the off and middle, swept away to long leg
Brown to Hodge, 1 run slow offcutter, outside off, cut down to thirdman.
Brown to Ponting, 1 bye drifts away, in the air, outside off, full in length, Ponting reaches out for it, doesn't make contact and the ball bounds of the 'keeper's pad
Brown to Hodge, 1 run drags this one short and Hodge pulls it behind square-leg
Brown to Ponting, no run beaten! slightly slow in pace and outside off, Ponting leans forward, wants to run it down to thirdman and is beaten

Brown to Ponting, 2 runs almost caught at cover. Ponting reaches out to a full-lenght delivery outside off stump, drives in air and it just falls short of the cover fielder. Ponting moves to 99. On the verge of his fourth WC ton
Brown to Ponting, no run Slower one ends up as a low full toss outside off and driven straight to cover.
Rogers to Hodge, OUT turns in from outside off, Hussey goes back, eases it to cover region
Rogers to Hussey, no run
Rogers to Hussey, 1 run sliding on to the pads and Hussey gets Ponting on strike with a dab past square-leg
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run Ricky Ponting ... Take a bow! 23rd ODI ton and his fourth WC hundred. Reaches it with a drive to long-on.
Rogers to Hussey, 1 run now Hussey gets it down to long on
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run
Brown to Ponting, 1 run just outside offstump, coming in slightly, turned past point
Brown to Hussey, 1 wide Sliding down leg side. Bucknor extends his arms to signal a wide.
Brown to Hussey, 1 run slightly short in length, on the middle and leg, dabbed past squareleg
Brown to Ponting, 2 runs again short of length, outside off and Ponting cuts it past cover
Brown to Ponting, SIX runs Slap-slog! Ponting now has the World record for the maximum sixes in World Cup. 24th six. He went down on his knee and slapped it over deep midwicket
Brown to Ponting, 2 runs
Brown to Ponting, 1 run attempted yorker, on the middle and leg, driven to long on
Wright to Ponting, no run almost at the blockhole, on the middle and off, Ponting can only push it back to the bowler
Wright to Ponting, OUT He is gone! He attempts another slap-slog, across the line, makes no contact and his offstump is pegged back.
Wright to Watson, no run on the off stump line, goes on straight, Watson pushes it to cover region
Wright to Watson, no run punched back to the bowler
Wright to Watson, 1 run on the off and middle stump line, pulled to deep midwicket
Wright to Hussey, 1 run on the off and middle stump line, pushed to cover point
Haq to Clarke, 2 runs pushed to the on side for couple of runs
Haq to Clarke, no run

Haq to Clarke, OUT Gotcha! Haq cleans up Clarke. Flat and fast as the offspinner pushed that one through, slightly short as well and Clarke goes for a pull but is beaten by the pace. The middle stump is pegged back.
Haq to Hodge, FOUR runs Hodge gets off the mark with a crisp cut.
Haq to Hodge, 1 run slower, on the off and middle, Hodge leans forward, turns it to squareleg
Haq to Ponting, no run
Wright to Hodge, FOUR runs Overpitched outside off and Hogg creams it through cover. Ala Damyn Martyn.
Wright to Hodge, 2 runs sliding on to the pads, tickled away fine
Wright to Hodge, no run full, straight, on the middle stump, Hodge gets his bat around his front pad, pushes it out towards mid-on
Wright to Hodge, no run
Wright to Hodge, 1 run around off stump, full in length, Hodge leans back, late-cuts it to thirdman

Wright to Ponting, 1 run appeal for lbw as Ponting is cramped for room while cutting. The ball came in slightly from outside off and Ponting thrust his left foot out and tried to cut. The ball brushed the pad before making contact with the bat but the point

Hoffmann to Hussey, OUT Colin Smith .... you beauty. Smart work behind the stumps. Full in length and angling away, Hussey makes no contact with his intended drive and his back foot is in the air. Smith gathers and quickly whips off the bails even as Hussey
Hoffmann to Hogg, 1 run On the pads, tapped behind square leg
Hoffmann to Watson, 2 runs sliding on the legs, flicked past square-leg
Hoffmann to Watson, no run just short of driveable length, on the off and middle stump line, punched on the up back to the bowler
Hoffmann to Watson, 1 run on the off and middle stump line, driven past the bowler
Hoffmann to Hogg, 1 wide wide outside off stump.
Hoffmann to Hogg, no run nagging line and length, on the off and middle and short of length, punched back to the bowler. No pace or room to work with for the batsman.
Wright to Watson, 1 run overpitched outside off, powered away to right of sweeper cover. There should have been an easy two but Hogg slipped when he tried to turn for the second.
Wright to Hogg, 2 runs overpitched on the legs, clipped away behind square-leg
Wright to Hogg, no run on the middle stump line, Hogg backs away, taps it towards point
Wright to Hogg, 1 run again he backs away, but can't get much power behind his drive. The ball rolls to right of cover
Wright to Watson, FOUR runs Whack! Watson frees his arms. Takes out the front foot outside the line and heaves a length-delivery past midwicket
Wright to Watson, FOUR runs Boom! Overpitched this time and Watson goes straight over the bowler who ducks under that missile.
Haq to Ponting, 2 runs floated outside off, Ponting drives it through the covers for couple of runs
Haq to Ponting, no run on the leg side, Ponting paddles it away but can't beat the short fine-leg man
Haq to Ponting, 1 run Ponting charges out, Haq sends that one slower through the air and Ponting's heave across the line only gets a thin inside edge and he will get across for a single
Haq to Hodge, no run turns in from outside off, Hodge is cramped for room as he tries to work it to the off side and is struck on the pad
Haq to Hodge, no run appeal for lbw as Hodge pushes forward in defense. Impact outside off.
Haq to Hodge, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Rogers to Hodge, no run floated on the middle stump line, pushed to the off side. No pace to work around.,
Rogers to Hodge, 1 run overpitched outside off, driven to long off
Rogers to Ponting, SIX runs That's maximum. Ponting charges out and lofts it straight over the bowler. Up ... up and over.
Rogers to Ponting, no run defense after offense. Leans forward to smother a fullish delivery
Rogers to Ponting, 1 run full and outside off, drilled to long-off
Rogers to Hodge, no run on the middle stump line, slight turn and defended off the front foot
Hoffmann to Hogg, FOUR runs Suddenly, its raining fours here. Another one that crashes into deep midwicket region. Slapped across the line.
Hoffmann to Hogg, 1 run Yorker, right up there on the middle and off, dug out towards cover point for a single
Hoffmann to Watson, FOUR runs Wallop! Overpitched outside off and Watson goes over extra cover.
Hoffmann to Watson, 1 run banged in short and outside off, tapped in the air towards thirdman region
Hoffmann to Hogg, SIX runs Whoa! This one disappears over long on. Overpitched again and Hogg gets under that one nicely.
Hoffmann to Hogg, 1 run
Brown to Hogg, SIX runs Hogg goes downtown. Right in the slot and Hogg creams it over long off.
Brown to Hogg, 2 runs Another whack but the long-on fielder gets across in time to make a smart stop
Brown to Hogg, FOUR runs Violence! Banged in short and Hogg pulls it over midwicket.
Brown to Hogg, SIX runs smash! Another one, in the slot, just outside off and Hogg drills it over long-off. Murder under cloudy skies
Brown to Hogg, 2 runs
Brown to Hogg, FOUR runs Australia end up with 334. This one slides down the legside and Hogg swings it to fine-leg boundary. Hogg ends up up with a blistering 15-ball 40!
More: Dougie Brown is the 11th bowler to concede more than 80 runs in World Cups.

Gopalakrishna, who is having a field day today, throws up another one. Out of 29 instances of totals over 300, 18 have come up against non-Test playing nations. This includes some games against Sri Lanka when they were not in the Test panel.
Bracken to Watts, no run Full and angling away, left alone
Bracken to Watts, no run on the hips, flicked to square-leg
Bracken to Watts, no run rushes down the channel outside off, has a lame poke but inside the line and the ball heads to Gilchrist
Bracken to Watts, no run In the zone outside off, just angling away - he is yet to bend it back in, left alone
Bracken to Watts, no run And again. Two slips in place.
Bracken to Watts, no run closer to the off stump, pushed out to cover. It will be Shaun Tait who be unleashed on the Scotland batsmen next over.
Tait to Haq, FOUR runs Majid Haq welcomes Tait with a slash past point. Overpitched and well outside off, Haq frees his arms
Tait to Haq, 1 wide Typical. A wide delivery outside off.
Tait to Haq, no run 141.2 kmph , on the off stump line, Haq gets behind, pushes it out to cover region
Tait to Haq, no run slash and a miss. short of length and outside off, Haq wants to cut but is beaten for pace
Tait to Haq, no run 145.7kmph, full-length delivery whizzng through the channel outside off, Haq doesn't move his feet, just has a lazy waft and is beaten
Tait to Haq, no run 147k, further away from the off stump, Haq is not able to reach to it.
Tait to Haq, 1 run gets on target, on the stumps, Haq calmly places it towards midwicket and will retain the strike.
Bracken to Haq, no run on the off and middle stump line, full in length, Haq leans forward to defend
Bracken to Haq, no run slightly short in length, just outside off, pushed to point
Bracken to Haq, 1 run drifting on to the pads, flicked away to fine leg.
Bracken to Watts, 1 run Watts is off the mark with a dab to backward point.
Bracken to Haq, 1 run Haq looks pretty solid out there. Leans forward to a length-delivery, eases it out into the covers
Bracken to Watts, no run Angling away from a length, Watts, who looks to have a pretty tight technique, lets it go.
Tait to Haq, no run Whistling through the channel outside off, left alone
Tait to Haq, no run Just outside off, Short in length and Haq has a flash but misses.
Tait to Haq, no run
Tait to Haq, 2 runs Short of length, outside off, Haq stands up tall to punch it through cover. Looks like a fiesty player
Tait to Haq, no run 145.8 kmph, sliding away through the channel outside off, Haq is bit late in his intended drive and doesn't get a touch
Tait to Haq, no run 147.6 kmph, banged in short of length and outside off, Haq sways away from the line
Bracken to Watts, no run full in length, just outside off, angling away and Watts leans forward, square-drives it towards point where Clarke makes the stop
Bracken to Watts, no run beaten! teasing delivery outside off and Watts stabs at it
Bracken to Watts, no run
Bracken to Watts, 2 runs lands on a length, outside off stump, sliding away, Watts eases forward, punches it on the up through cover

Bracken to Watts, 1 run dropped by a flying Watson at second slip. Has he dropped the World Cup?! Full and outside off, Watts drives, gets a thick edge and Watto goes parallel to the ground with an outstretched right hand but ends up palming it.
Bracken to Haq, 1 run Just short of length, outside off, cut down to thirdman
Tait to Haq, FOUR runs Whack! Haq creams it through cover. Overpitched outside off and Haq thrusts forward and drives it to the cover boundary. Super strike
Tait to Haq, no run Tait cranks up the pace and shortens the length. 150kmph short-pitched stuff, outside off and Haq sways away
Tait to Haq, no run cramped for room. Lands short of length, on the middle and leg, straightens and Haq tries to cut but is beaten by the straigthening. It crashes against his thigh pad
Tait to Haq, no run Fast and furious. Whistles past the chest of Haq who, again, sways away

Tait to Haq, 2 runs, OUT Clarke misses a run-out but McGrath does it! Punched to cover and they set off for a run. Clarke fires in a throw at the non-striker's end, the batsman had given up but the ball misses the sticks. They run for overthrows. They turn g
Tait to Watts, 1 run Full and straight outside off, Watts drives, gets an outside edge which takes the ball to the left of thirdman
Bracken to Watts, no run Full length ball on off, driven back to the bowler
Bracken to Watts, no run Straighter this time, tucked to the on side but no run that time
Bracken to Watts, 1 run Back of a length, steered to the covers for an easy single
Bracken to Poonia, 1 run Back of a length, rocks back and angles it to the on side for a quick single. That seems to be the tactic now
Bracken to Watts, no run Slower ball this time. Nice change of pace by Bracken. Watts tries to tip and run but hits it straight to the fielder
Bracken to Watts, no run Back of a length and outside off, square driven to cover
Tait to Poonia, no run Banged in short from Tait. Screaming delivery that but the line was all wrong. Batsman simply had to duck out of the way
Tait to Poonia, 1 leg bye Furious delivery again but drifting down leg. Full ball and Poonia gets a leg bye to fine leg
Tait to Watts, 1 wide Tait getting his line all wrong here. Down the leg side again and Gilchrist collects it well diving to his left
Tait to Watts, 1 run Finally on off stump. Tapped away for a single to cover

Tait to Poonia, OUT Ripper! Full ball this time and swinging in from outside off. Poonia tries to get his bat down in time but can only end up playing all over it. Ball beats him for pace and clatters into the middle and leg stumps. Too fast and too furious.
Tait to Watson, no run Another yorker-length delivery but not on line this time. New batsman has no clue
Tait to Watson, 2 runs Full and straight again but batsman flicks it to the leg side for a brace
Bracken to Watts, no run Driven to mid-off. Full length from Bracken while bowling over the wicket
Bracken to Watts, no run Good use of the angle again. Over the wicket from Bracken and batsman beaten while going for the cover drive. Airy shot that
Bracken to Watts, 1 run Defended to the off side. Cautiously played
Bracken to Watson, no run Full and outside off, Watson simply shoulders arms and lets it go
Bracken to Watson, no run Similar delivery, slightly wide of off and Watson simply shoulders arms yet again
Bracken to Watson, no run Straight and back of a length, defended solidly back to the bowler
McGrath to Watts, 1 run on top of the offstump, nudged down to third man
McGrath to Watson, 1 run again on the offstump line, tapped close on the off side and they rush across for a quick single
McGrath to Hamilton, no run welcomes the new batsman with a bouncer. On the leg and middle stump line, ducked under
McGrath to Hamilton, no run 130 kmph delivery, gets bounce from the good length and it angles away, left alone
McGrath to Hamilton, no run 126.3 kmph, in the zone outside off, left alone
Watson to Watson, no run Watson starts off with a delivery on the off stump line, pushed to point
Watson to Watson, no run slightly fuller, on the off and middle, comes in a touch, worked to the on side
Watson to Watson, no run beaten! Full, in the teasing channel outside off stump, and goes on straight. Watson ends up pushing inside the line but atleast he didn't hang his bat out.
Watson to Watson, no run Perfume ball! Screams in at the throat of Watson who sways away
Watson to Watson, no run beaten all hands up. Landed on a length, around off stump and then straightened a touch. Watson, again, plays inside the line.
Watson to Watson, no run slides on to the pads and is rapped on the front pad. Going down though.
McGrath to Hamilton, 1 run on the legs, clipped off the pads to Hogg at fine leg
McGrath to Watson, no run
McGrath to Watson, 1 run honing in on the middle stump line, full in length, he has a stab at it and gets a inside edge, down to long leg
McGrath to Hamilton, no run full and straight, a forward prod, clips the inside edge and on to the pad
McGrath to Hamilton, no run Hamilton gets behind that one and offers the full face of the bat in defense
McGrath to Hamilton, no run
Watson to Watson, no run attempted yorker, on the middle stump line, dug out to cover
Watson to Watson, 1 run short of length, on the leg and middle, helped past square-leg
Watson to Hamilton, no run
Watson to Hamilton, 1 run on a length, around off and middle, tapped close to the off stump and they rush across for a quick single. Ponting swoops in from cover but doesn't manage to pick the ball.
Watson to Watson, 1 run from wide of the crease, full in length, on the off stump, pushed to cover point
Watson to Hamilton, no run 133.5kmph bouncer and easily ducked under
McGrath to Watson, no run just short of length, on the off stump, pushed to point
McGrath to Watson, no run And again.

McGrath to Brown, no run serves a yorker! dug out past the bowler and Brown sets off for a run. Hamiton doesn't bother to move. He stays rooted. Could have got ugly but Brown gets back in time before the throw from mid-on comes.
McGrath to Brown, no run
McGrath to Brown, FOUR runs Punched away! Short of length, just outside off and Brown moved into the line and hit it on the up through the cover region. Super shot that.
Watson to Hamilton, no run angling away, punched to cover
Watson to Hamilton, no run hits the deck short of length, around middle and off, Hamilton goes back, whips it across the line towards midwicket
Watson to Hamilton, no run slightly overpitched, on the off stump line, driven to cover
Watson to Hamilton, no run Short of length, sliding away outside off, Hamilton rocks back to punch it to cover
Watson to Hamilton, 1 run back-of-length, on the off stump line and Hamilton whips it to the on side
Watson to Brown, no run bouncer and Brown has no problem in getting under that.
McGrath to Hamilton, no run rushes towards the off stump, Hamilton eases it towards covers, wants a run and this time its Dougie's turn to send him back.
McGrath to Hamilton, no run 130.04 kmph and whistling through the channel outside off. Bit of bounce as well and Hamilton has a poke at it and is beaten
McGrath to Smith, no run
McGrath to Smith, no run 128.8 kmph yorker on the middle stump, jabbed back down the track
McGrath to Smith, no run
Watson to Brown, no run full and straight, driven back to the bowler
Watson to Brown, no run fullish, outside off, square-driven to point
Watson to Brown, FOUR runs Caressed away. Overpitched outside off and Dougie Brown leant into his cover drive
Watson to Brown, no run drags back the length, on the off stump line, pushed to point
Watson to Brown, no run fuller and on the off and middle, driven to cover
Watson to Brown, no run on the off stump line, full and straight, pushed to cover region
McGrath to Smith, no run angling in from outside off, jabbed away to the off side
McGrath to Smith, no run 122.6 kmph bouncer and ducked under
McGrath to Smith, 1 run lands on a length, outside off, comes in a touch, dabbed past backward point
McGrath to Brown, no run another length-delivery, on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
McGrath to Brown, no run And again.
McGrath to Brown, no run Deja-vu.
Tait to Smith, no run full and outside off, driven to cover
Tait to Smith, 2 runs
Tait to Smith, FOUR runs Creamed away! Overpitched outside off, you can have pace but you got to hit the right areas, else you will be bleeding. Driven through cover
Tait to Smith, no run 142.k bouncer comes as a response. No problem in letting that one fly past him
Tait to Smith, FOUR runs Another one drilled through the off side. Tait is bowling half-volleys here and is paying for them.
Tait to Smith, no run
McGrath to Brown, FOUR runs Wow! Dougie Brown lets rip. Shot of the day. Length-delivery, just outside off and Brown thrusts his left foot out and square-drives past point. Screaming shot.
McGrath to Brown, no run overpitched outside off, driven to cover
McGrath to Brown, (no ball) lands on a length, just outside off, comes in a tad, defended away
McGrath to Brown, no run on top of the offstump, again that disconcerting bounce, Dougie Brown gets behind that one, pushes it out to off side
McGrath to Brown, no run honing in on the off stump, eased into cover
McGrath to Brown, no run lands outside off, straightens a touch, nudged to point
McGrath to Brown, no run The usual McGrath line. Defended away to the cover region
Hogg to Smith, no run turns in from outside off, not much, run down to short third man
Hogg to Smith, no run tossed up a touch, outside off, again run down to short third man
Hogg to Smith, no run flighted outside off, drilled right back at the bowler
Hogg to Smith, no run googly arrives. Lands on a length around off stump, Smith picks it off the turf and lets it go through to Gilchrist
Hogg to Smith, 1 run floated on off and middle, driven to long on
Hogg to Brown, 2 leg byes lands outside off, turns in, Smith pushes at it, the ball bounds off the pad, through the vacant slip region for couple of runs
Watson to Smith, no run overpitched on the off stump, smashed to cover
Watson to Smith, no run just short of length, just outside off stump, nudged to backward point
Watson to Smith, no run just short of driveable length, on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
Watson to Smith, 1 run honing in on the off stump line, nudged to backward point
Watson to Brown, no run bouncer. Again sails harmlessly over the batsman
Watson to Brown, no run back-of-length delivery, on the off stump line, defended off the front foot
Hogg to Smith, 1 run floated outside off, swept to deep midwicket
Hogg to Brown, 1 run low full toss, on the middle stump line, driven to long on
Hogg to Smith, 1 run
Hogg to Brown, 1 run lands outside off, full in length, pushed to left of cover where Clarke gets across but can't prevent a single
Hogg to Smith, no run spins from outside off, rapped on the pad as he pushes forward in defense
Hogg to Smith, 1 run short and pulled but straight to the man at deep midwicket
Watson to Smith, no run lands outside off, comes in a touch, pushed to point
Watson to Smith, no run slow legcutter that landed on the off stump line before curving away. Smith does well not to chase after it, ends up pushing down the line
Watson to Smith, FOUR runs Crack! Gives the charge, Watson responds by banging it in and Smith backs away to cut it over backward point.
Watson to Smith, no run short of length, on the off stump line, nudged to point
Watson to Smith, 1 wide
Watson to Smith, no run on the off and middle stump line, worked to the on side
Watson to Smith, no run strangling line, around off and middle, pushed back down the track
Hogg to Brown, 1 run on the off and middle, slight turn in, dabbed to right of square-leg
Hogg to Smith, no run lovely flight, dips in front of off stump line, pushed back down the track
Hogg to Smith, 1 run googly, fraction short and swept past midwicket
Hogg to Brown, no run turns in from outside off, padded away
Hogg to Brown, no run pushes that wider, bit slower in the air, inviting a drive but resisted. Just nudged away to point
Hogg to Brown, no run on the middle this time, turned to midwicket
Watson to Smith, 1 run full and straight on the off stump, punched to long on
Watson to Brown, 1 run full and outside off, run down to third man
Watson to Smith, 1 run leg cutter on the off stump line, punched to long off
Watson to Brown, no run bouncer and easily ducked under
Watson to Brown, no run on the middle and leg, from short of length, dabbed towards mid-on
Watson to Brown, 1 run straight delivery on the off stump, driven to right of mid-off
Hogg to Brown, 1 run worked to right of Ponting at midwicket and they will get a single
Hogg to Smith, no run leans forward to a delivery that lands outside off and pushes it towards point
Hogg to Smith, no run Googly that lands outside leg stump, he shapes to sweep and is rapped on the pad
Hogg to Smith, no run tossed up, on the middle, driven back to the bowler
Hogg to Smith, FOUR runs edge but no slip in place. Tossed up outside off and Smith drives only to get an edge.
Hogg to Smith, no run slightly short, turns in, cut to backward point
Hodge to Brown, no run on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
Hodge to Brown, 1 run lands just outside off, slightly short and paddled away to fine leg
Hodge to Smith, 1 run bit of flight, not much of a loop, and Smith comes down the track to drive it to long on
Hodge to Wright, 1 run slow turn, from outside off stump, worked past square-leg
Hodge to Smith, no run tossed up outside off, comes down the track but is unable to get to the pitch. Changes tack and defends.
Hogg to Wright, no run lands outside off stump, turns in slightly and padded away. They go up in appeal but it didn't turn in enough
Hogg to Wright, no run turn and bounce. lands outside off, comes in and goes through the bat and pad gap to Gilchrist.
Hogg to Wright, no run
Hogg to Wright, no run googly, lands on off and middle, turns away, nudged to silly point
Hogg to Wright, no run spins in from outside off, defended off the front foot
Hogg to Wright, 1 run quicker, on the middle and off, turns in, worked to midwicket
Hodge to Wright, no run short in length, turns down leg side, tickled to square-leg
Hodge to Wright, no run lands on the middle stump line, turns towards leg stump, tickled to the leg side
Hodge to Wright, 1 run comes down the track, takes it on the full, drives it to long off
Hodge to Smith, 1 run on the middle and leg, turned to right of square-leg
Hodge to Wright, 1 run down the track and a drive to long on
Hodge to Smith, FOUR runs long-hop on the leg and middle, pulled in front of square. Easy.
Hogg to Wright, no run googly, itching to come forward, arrests his movement on seeing the googly and pushes it out to point
Hogg to Wright, no run another googly, attempted sweep, no contact.
Hogg to Wright, no run leans forward to smother a full-length delivery
Hogg to Wright, no run
Hogg to Wright, no run appeal for lbw as he pushes forward in defence. hit on the off stump line and the ball was turning in. Hmm...
Hogg to Wright, no run low full toss, outside off, attempted sweep shot and is rapped on the pad
Hodge to Smith, no run
Hodge to Smith, no run floated outside off, driven to left of Hodge who makes a good tumbling stop
Hodge to Smith, no run shouts of catch it as he turns a length delivery in the air towards midwicket but it falls well short of Ponting
Hodge to Smith, 1 run tossed up on the middle and leg, driven to long on
Hodge to Wright, no run driven back to the bowler
Hodge to Wright, no run floated on the off stump line, attempts to work it to on side and is rapped on the pad
Tait to Smith, no run Tait starts off with a full delivery down the leg side, Smith tries to paddle it but can only take it on the pads
Tait to Smith, no run Short and wide outside off. Steepling delivery and Smith's waft can only strike the air. Tait too fast for Scotland. Now if only he could get his direction more often
Tait to Smith, 1 run Back of a length and on off. Smith jabs to the off side and takes off for a single. 100 comes up for Scotland and the crowd is ecstatic

Tait to Wright, 4 leg byes Speared down leg again. Thank heavens Tait isn't a fighter pilot. His sense of direction is so awry. Batsman simply has to kick it away to the fine leg fence. Looked more like byes though

Tait to Wright, OUT Gone. That's much better. Full and straight and screaming quick. Wright shuffles across the crease and is a sitting duck in front of the wicket. Struck on the pads and Asoka de Silva has no hesitation in giving the decision. Plumb as it
Tait to Rogers, no run Full and straight again. 147.4 kph and swinging in. Rogers gets his bat down in time and keeps it away
Hodge to Smith, no run Full ball, sweep not well timed
Hodge to Smith, no run Driven to gully, straight to the fielder
Hodge to Smith, no run Back of a length and straight, tapped to the leg side
Hodge to Smith, no run defended back to the bowler
Hodge to Smith, 1 run taps it to the off side and takes off for a quick single

Hodge to Rogers, no run Well tossed up outside off, batsmen in a quandry about whether to attack or defend and chooses the safer option in the last moment. Silly point waiting for the edge but it drops short
Tait to Smith, no run Full and straight. Batsman keeps it out again. When Tait gets it on the money, the batsmen can only jut their bat out and hope
Tait to Smith, FOUR runs Or. As Colin Smith prefers back away and clatter it past gully for a sizzling boundary
Tait to Smith, no run Attempted yorker, Smith keeps it out and gets it to gully
Tait to Smith, 1 leg bye Full and on leg stump. 141.4 from Tait. The ball deflects off Smith's pads and they scamper a leg bye
Tait to Rogers, 3 wide And there we go again. Way, way down leg side. Past the batsman, past Gilchrist and almost past the diving Bracken at fine leg. But he stops the boundary
Tait to Rogers, no run Full ball off stump, batsman keeps it out to the off side
Tait to Rogers, 1 run Cover driven for a single
Hodge to Rogers, no run beaten. Short in length and outside off, shapes to cut but no contact
Hodge to Rogers, 1 run well outside off, reaches out for it and drives to right of cover where a tumbling half-stop is made
Hodge to Smith, no run tossed up, full in length, charges out, misses the drive but drags back his feet in time before Gilchrist whipped off the bails
Hodge to Smith, 2 runs slightly short, on off and middle, rocks back to pull it to left of deep midwicket.
Hodge to Smith, 1 run again slightly short, this time just outside off, Smith goes back to punch it to sweeper cover
Hodge to Rogers, no run tossed up, outside off, driven to cover
Tait to Smith, 1 run
Tait to Rogers, 1 leg bye drifting on to the pads, runs down behind square-leg
Tait to Smith, FOUR runs where did that come from? Smith backs away and crashes a fullish delivery on the middle stump, past backward point!
Tait to Smith, 1 run on the middle stump, 142.2 kmph, stabs at it and gets a inside edge down to long leg
Tait to Rogers, 1 run full and straight, just outside off, he attempts to drive it, another inside-edge and the ball rolls over towards short fine leg
Tait to Smith, no run
Hodge to Rogers, no run on the off stump line, Rogers pushes it back to the bowler
Hodge to Rogers, 1 run pushes it outside off, Rogers gets across, taps it to cover region for a single
Hodge to Smith, no run short in length, outside off, keeps a touch low, and punched to cover
Hodge to Smith, no run bit of drift away and lands well outside off, SMith reaches out for it, is beaten by the drift, jabs it away
Hodge to Smith, no run closer to the off stump and pushed back down the track
Hodge to Smith, no run slightly short, on the off and middle, punched back to Hodge
Hogg to Rogers, no run slow through the air, drifts away and lands outside off, turns in, prodded away
Hogg to Rogers, no run turns in quickly, from outside off, gets through the bat and pad gap and runs off the back thigh towards short thirdman region
Hogg to Rogers, 1 run googly, well picked up and dabbed to backward point region

Hogg to Smith, 1 run fifty up for Smith. His colleagues in the pavilion stand up to applaud. Scottish fans in the arena clear their lungs. Maiden fifty. Only the second Scottish batsman to get a fifty in WC. On the legs and swept away to long leg
Hogg to Rogers, no run
Hogg to Rogers, no run beaten flirting outside off and Gilchrist whips off the bails but the batsman had not left his castle.
Bracken to Smith, no run sliding down the off stump line, nudged to point
Bracken to Smith, 1 run full in length, outside off, pushed to left of cover and they will get a single
Bracken to Rogers, no run
Bracken to Rogers, no run full in length, on the off and middle, drives and gets an outside edge to point
Bracken to Rogers, 1 run pushed to left of Ponting at cover who has a shy at non-striker's end.

Bracken to Smith, OUT A run out! offcutter on the off stump line, pushed towards Hayden who rushes in from point and rolls it along the ground to Gilchrist - lost some time there but still fast enough to catch the batsman short.

Hogg to Smith, OUT Sharp turn there! Cleans up Smith. Lands outside off stump and spins back sharply. He shapes to cut but is surprised by the turn and its all over. Good outing for Smith. This is the 48th instance of a batsman registering 50+ score on Worl
Man of the Match Ricky Ponting
Australia won by 203 runs
Player of the match is Ricky Ponting, AUS
